context:
George Brown College offers various opportunities for students to transfer credits from one program to another within the college. Eligibility for internal transfer may require additional admissions procedures and consultation with specific departments. Students can find information on block transfer opportunities in the Transfer Agreements and Opportunities Database. The college provides many paths for further studies, including diploma to degree bridging programs and fast-track condensed programs. George Brown offers career-focused postgraduate programs that can be completed in 8 to 12 months. Students are encouraged to sign up for updates on application deadlines, college news, events, and tours via email or visiting the social media hub. The contact information is 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) and ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
